    • Constructor Detail

      • LicenseManager

        public LicenseManager()

    • Method Detail

      • makeLicense

        public boolean makeLicense(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension,
                  int numberOfRuns)
        This is the first method to be called. It generates the default license file in which you can modify at any time.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        numberOfRuns - The number of runs the user is allowed to have for the specified license file. a "-1" indicates that the license is free.
        Returns:
        true if making the license file was successful and false otherwise.

      • isLicenseValid

        public boolean isLicenseValid(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension)
        This method checks if the specified license file belongs to this PC and don't check for anything else.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        Returns:
        true if and only if this license file belongs to the running PC. It doesn't mean that this license has remaining number of runs.

      • makeLicenseFree

        public boolean makeLicenseFree(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension,
                      java.lang.String pcKey)
        Call this method when you want your license to be free, but make sure to call the method "makeLicense" first to make a license file.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        pcKey - The key that matches the ID for a given PC.
        Returns:
        true if the license was made free successfully.

      • setNumberOfRuns

        public void setNumberOfRuns(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension,
                   int newNumberOfRuns)
        Sets the remaining number of runs for the specified license file.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        newNumberOfRuns - The new number of runs to set the specified license with.

      • getNumberOfRuns

        public int getNumberOfRuns(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension)
        Gets the remaining number of runs for the specified license.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        Returns:
        the remaining number of runs.

      • getPCID

        public java.lang.String getPCID(java.lang.String pathFilenameExtension)
        Gets the ID for the running PC in preparation for generating the key for it.
        Parameters:
        pathFilenameExtension - The path of the license file along with its name and extension (i.e. "C:/Program Files/My Program/License.data")
        Returns:
        the PC ID.
